entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 1:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
